subject: Shipping
description_text:
Hello I was trying to buy the 
SIMSONN PC USB 7+R H Simulator Gear Shifter

But in check out there wasn’t a option for shipping to Poland. Is that a sim sort of glitch or have you stopped shipping to Poland
Ps: 
I tried with other products but the option wasn’t there

conversations.body_text: Hi Krzysztof Sawicki,  Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland  https:/fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn
